module.additional_description: This module helps to screen your order transaction for online frauds. The sophisticated and advanced engines help you to thoroughly scan through all elements, such as geolocation, proxy, email, blacklisted, BIN, velocity, and many more to accurately identify potential fraud order. This module came with one month Mini Plan license, that allowing you 1500 queries/month. After the purchase, please contact FraudLabs Pro to unlock the license.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews.
module.additional_description: We offer a solution that will give you a 360 degree "voice of the customer" strategy which includes: multichannel collection, monitoring and moderation platform, statistics engine & verbatim analysis, syndication of opinions, and retrieval of opinions from third-party sources. 1. A quick and easy all-in-one solution. 2. From site reviews, product reviews, and business reviews everything in our soultion can be adapted to your needs including personalized opinion email requests, campaign deadlines, and how the widgets are displayed. 3. Google Partner - display stars in your search and PLA google ads campaigns thanks to our partnership with Google. 4. A trusted third party - Our feedback requests are make after the purchase on 100% of your buyers. 5. By turning customer opinions into a KPI, you are engaging with your teams in a positive way, engaging in better communication and optimizing your entire business. 6. Take advantage of the interconnection between our opinion platform and other Skeepers products and put your customer at the heart of your marketing strategy.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work:- Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: smartsupp
module.displayName: Chatbots, live chat, video recordings - Smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp combines live chat, chatbots, and video recordings into an affordable package that saves you time and resources in order to help you turn your visitors into loyal customers.
module.additional_description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp helps businesses deliver a personalized online shopping experience and drives sales by combining live chat, chatbots and video recordings, allowing you to genuinely connect with your customers to better identify their needs. As one of the most popular ecommerce solutions in the world with over 50,000 active webshops and websites, Smartsupp offers:A one-and-only combination of live chat, chatbots, and video recordings–automate responses to repetitive questions, deliver personal service when needed and see how and where you can improve your conversion rate. Access to real-time visitor lists enriched with e-commerce data–see who is browsing your webshop, which products they are interested in and proactively start a conversation to assist you in making a sale. A FREE Mobile App–be more accessible to your customers with Smartsupp’s app for iOS and Android phones so that you can reply to visitor inquiries even when you are in the warehouse or on the go. What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices. What's New with Amazon Pay? When shoppers check out with Amazon Pay and Affirm, they get more flexibility than ever (US only).
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

Continuously optimise checkout with built-in conversion logic that reduces user friction and adjusts across devices.  Satisfy customer preferences and increase conversion with local payment methods like SEPA Direct Debit, iDEAL, Bancontact, P24, EPS, Giropay, FPX, popular wallets such as Apple Pay and Google Pay, and buy now, pay later methods. Simply turn on over 40 payment methods with no additional development required and dynamically display the most relevant payment methods based on your customers’ location and device. It’s a reliable and secure platform trusted by millions of ecommerce businesses around the world that protects your customers from data breaches, fraud, and security threats. Stay compliant with PSD2 SCA requirements in Europe with no additional development work.

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.description: ShipStation is the leading web-based shipping solution that helps ecommerce retailers import, organize, and ship orders quickly and easily—wherever you sell, however you ship
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShipStation is the leading web-based shipping solution that helps ecommerce retailers import, organize, and ship orders quickly and easily—wherever you sell, however you ship.
module.additional_description: Connect to more customers and more sales channels ShipStation can connect you to even more customers through our growing list of over 100 different stores, shopping carts and marketplaces – more than any other shipping application. module.description_full: Klaviyo, a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more, gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions—so you can build long-term customer relationships at scale, and grow your business on your own terms.
module.additional_description: Automations to help you make money while you sleep.Dozens of built-in automations are fully customizable, like welcome emails, happy birthday, or abandon cart. Each can have any mix of emails and texts. So while you’re dreaming up your next big idea, customers are automatically getting timely, actionable info. Smarter targeting. Deeper personalization. Bigger payoff.Drive more sales with powerful personalization. Whether you’re sending a drip campaign, a transactional email, or a special holiday campaign, ultra-relevant content can help you boost engagement—and earn more revenue. Get more answers out of your data.Data is powerful—but only if you can find it, understand it, and act on it. With Klaviyo, performance is clear. module.additional_description: The main benefits of Cybersource are, users can use it to accept payments in more than 40 currencies from more than 190 countries, plus it has excellent anti-fraud tool. Cybersource has features like secure acceptance and global fraud management. Tokenization technologies also ensure transactions are secure and remove sensitive payment data from the transaction. Fraud analysts also look at worldwide trends so Cybersource’s own processes can be monitored and fine-tuned. Cybersource users can also accept payments from multiple channels, be it mobile, web, or even a call center. Transactions have a universal token and central database that supports all channels and offer users a complete view of customer activity. Information gleaned from this can then be used for marketing activities and customer analysis. Chargebacks, payments, and support queries are all handled safely, thanks to Format-preserving tokens. Merchants worldwide get an enterprise-class solution when they start using Cybersource, as it has a payment management solution that is comprehensive and can be used for retail, travel, small businesses, media and entertainment.

module.name: pmproductvideoreviews
module.description: Publish authentic customer reviews with video reviews and increase your conversion rate! rec.reviews automatically collects video product reviews from your customers
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: Publish authentic customer reviews with video reviews and increase your conversion rate! rec.reviews automatically collects video product reviews from your customers. Capitalize on the key reassurance factor: video customer review
module.additional_description: rec.reviews is a fully automated service that lets you easily collect your customers' video reviews and publish them, once validated, on your online store and YouTube channel. VIDEO: A KEY FACTOR IN REASSURING CUSTOMERS The importance of customer reviews has long since been proven. We know that more than 9 out of 10 consumers consult reviews before purchasing, seeking reassurance on the conformity and characteristics of the desired product. Indeed, the best way to be convinced is to ask another buyer. Today, customer experience is much more important than advertising and all those marketing strategies that lack authenticity. Nowadays, however, and particularly with the development of increasingly sophisticated artificial intelligences accessible to all, fake text reviews are becoming more and more common. Internet users are less and less fooled and tend not to trust what they read. On the other hand, videos are booming, especially those in which consumers share their feelings about a product. 84% of customers claim to have made a purchasing decision after watching a video. Whereas behind a text review there is always the doubt of the source and the veracity of the words, seeing a real person talk about his experience makes the testimonial much more authentic and credible, and proves to be formidably effective in convincing web users in their purchasing decision. Moreover, it allows you to view the object from every angle, and to reassure yourself about key product characteristics such as color or size, as if you were in a physical store. Conversions are thus greatly facilitated, and the number of product returns due to non-conformity with the description is also inevitably reduced. MAKE YOUR CUSTOMERS YOUR BEST AMBASSADORS With rec.reviews you enable your visitors to be reassured about the product they want to buy, by viewing, directly on your site, the video reviews of real customers who have the same needs and expectations as they do, and who share their feelings about the product they've ordered. Convincing power guaranteed. This technique, which combines authenticity, customer feedback and mutual support, is known as "User Generated Content": by sharing their experience in a natural and spontaneous way within a short video, your own customers create quality content on your site and help future buyers. They become your best ambassadors, whether on your online store or on social networks, and help create a community around your products. This is an excellent opportunity to increase your conversion rate, generate engagement and build customer loyalty. Still little used, displaying video customer reviews on your store will also help you stand out from the competition. By offering an original shopping experience based on mutual assistance between your customers and the collection of video reviews, you'll arouse the interest of Internet users. Moreover, by letting your customers testify publicly on video, you show that you're not cheating and that you offer quality. Video reviews are therefore a real way of increasing your traffic. IMPROVE YOUR SEO Finally, as video is the medium that captures the most attention, by adding videos to your pages your visitors will spend more time on your site, which will improve your SEO. Indeed, Google favorably ranks pages on which a significant amount of time is spent. Given that a user spends on average 88% more time on a page containing a video, this type of media, therefore, is essential for the SEO of your store. REC.REVIEWS A FULLY AUTOMATED SERVICE The principle is very simple: once a customer has purchased a product, he receives an e-mail automatically inviting him to click on a link to record his opinion in a short video (30 seconds maximum). He can re-watch the video and repeat the recording as many times as he wants. He is also invited to leave a rating between 1 and 5 for the product. The video is then made available to you on a dedicated dashboard and, if you validate it, it is automatically posted on the corresponding product page. But that's not all! You can also easily share the video review on your YouTube channel. rec.reviews takes care of the video editing for you, with your store logo and essential customer authentication information (order date, review recording date, product rating, etc.), and stores the video on a dedicated space. So you don't have to worry about managing your bandwidth, traffic or disk space.

module.additional_description: Enhanced Security: Customers can protect their online platforms by blocking access from specific countries known for cyber threats or high-risk activities.Customized User Experience: Customers can tailor their websites or applications to cater to specific regions, providing a personalized experience for visitors from targeted countries.Compliance and Regulatory Support: The app helps customers comply with local regulations by preventing access from countries where their services may be restricted or prohibited.Improved Website Performance: Blocking traffic from countries with low relevance or high latency can optimize website performance and enhance the user experience for visitors from desired regions.Mitigation of Spam and Fraud: By blocking countries with a high incidence of spam or fraudulent activities, customers can minimize the risk of malicious attacks, scams, and unauthorized access attempts.Resource Optimization: Blocking traffic from countries that have minimal engagement or conversion rates helps optimize server resources and bandwidth, resulting in cost savings for customers.Flexibility and Control: The app empowers customers with the flexibility to choose which countries to block or allow, giving them granular control over their online presence and user base.Brand Protection: Customers can protect their brand reputation by preventing access from countries associated with counterfeit products, piracy, or trademark infringements.Peace of Mind: Easy Country Blocker provides customers with peace of mind, knowing that they have an effective tool to manage and secure their online platforms according to their preferences and requirements.
